title: JP Kitty Voice
description: JP Kitty Voice is a collection of cat meow sound effects taken from recordings of female voice actors.
longDescription:
From meows so realistic you can barely tell them apart from a real cat, to comical, anthropomorphized meows, to screams and yowls that are very hard to record, there's a total of 375 of these hard-to-find meow samples.


We recorded the performances of Japanese voice actresses as wav (44.1kHz/16bit/Mono) files,

and then edited/cleaned up the files for easy use in games or movies.


"I want to put a cat's voice into my anime movie, but I can't record the real thing how I'd like it."

"There's a cat that appears in my game, but I can't find a voice that fits the scene."


If you've thought something like that to yourself, this collection of sound effects will help with this problem that you just can't quite get sounding perfectly.


Sound preview (youtube)
technicalDetails:
Features: (Please include a full, comprehensive list of the features of the product)

  • A collection of cat meow sound effects taken from recordings of female voice actors.
  • From meows so realistic you can barely tell them apart from a real cat.

Number of Audio Waves:375

Do Sound FX loop: No
